thread.title: Germania colloca 2,413 mld riapertura Bund 2028 a tasso medio 0,67% Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 2,413 mld riapertura Bund 2028 a tasso medio 0,67% Bond |
text: Feb 28 (Reuters) - German Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 2.413 billion euros in a top up of its 0.50 percent, 10-year Bund at the lowest price of 98.31, the Bundesbank said on Wednesday. The notes (ISIN:DE0001102440) are due to mature on Feb 15, 2028. The settlement date is March 02. Results of Feb 07 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 28/02/18 07/02/18 AVG. YIELD 0.67 pct 0.69 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 98.32 98.17 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 98.31 98.16 TAIL 0.01 0.01 TOTAL BIDS 2.865 bln euros 3.756 bln euros ALLOTTED 2.413 bln euros 2.492 bln euros RETAINED 0.587 bln euros 0.508 bln euros BID COVER RATIO 1.2 1.5 TOTAL VOLUME 11.0 bln euros 8.0 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at ESZB/BBK04.
